comment: /**  * Returns the value which could not be converted  */
code: /**  * Returns the value which could not be converted  */ public Object getValue() {     return value. }
/**  * Returns the required <tt>to</tt> type  */ public Class<?> getToType() {     return type. }

comment: /**  * Returns the required <tt>from</tt> type.  * Returns <tt>null</tt> if the provided value was null.  */
code: /**  * Returns the required <tt>from</tt> type.  * Returns <tt>null</tt> if the provided value was null.  */ public Class<?> getFromType() {     if (value != null) {         return value.getClass().     } else {         return null.     } }

comment: /**  * Returns an error message for type conversion failed.  */
code: /**  * Returns an error message for type conversion failed.  */ public static String createMessage(Object value, Class<?> type, Throwable cause) {     return "Error during type conversion from type: " + (value != null ? value.getClass().getCanonicalName() : null) + " to the required type: " + type.getCanonicalName() + " with value " + value + " due to " + cause.getClass().getName() + ": " + cause.getMessage(). }
